visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart displaying the top 10 countries in wheat exportation for the year 2019. The chart should have a title 'Top 10 countries in wheat exportation (2019)' and a subtitle with a source link. The x-axis should list the countries, and the y-axis should display the exportation in billion US$. The columns should have data labels showing the exportation value in billion US$. The chart should allow y-axis zooming and have a tooltip that shows the exportation value with the suffix 'billion US$'. The legend should be disabled, and the chart should have a specific background color for the tooltip.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart that visualizes the top 10 countries in wheat exportation for the year 2019. The chart includes a main title and a subtitle with a source link. The x-axis lists the countries, and the y-axis displays the exportation values in billion US$. The columns are styled with data labels showing the exact exportation value in billion US$. The chart allows zooming along the y-axis, which is useful for detailed analysis of the exportation values. The tooltip, when hovered over a column, displays the exportation value with the suffix 'billion US$' and has a specific background color for better visibility. The legend is disabled as there is only one series of data. The chart is designed to be accessible, with descriptions provided for screen readers.
